scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "cd backend && uvicorn api.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "cd backend && uvicorn api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start"
